description: A well-worn but sturdy leash that once connected a loyal Labrador to her beloved daddy. The handle is smooth from countless walks together, and it still carries the faint scent of adventure and unconditional love. When held, it brings comfort and memories of simpler times.

use_action.activation_message: You hold Nova's leash close and remember better days. The memories of loyal walks bring you peace.

description: A slightly chewed tennis ball, bright yellow-green despite the apocalypse. Nova's playful spirit seems to live on in this simple toy. Perfect for throwing - she always brought it back with such joy.

A soft, padded collar that once graced the neck of a gentle Labrador. It's adjustable and surprisingly comfortable for humans too. Wearing it brings a sense of Nova's submissive, friendly nature - a reminder that sometimes being gentle is the greatest strength.

A plush, cushioned dog bed that still holds the impression of where Nova used to curl up. The fabric is soft and worn from countless naps. Sleeping on it brings dreams of loyal companionship and peaceful rest.

use_action.activation_message: You rest on Nova's bed and feel her comforting presence. Sweet dreams come easier here.

description: A soft fleece blanket that Nova loved to snuggle under. It still smells faintly of her warmth and comfort. Wrapping yourself in it feels like receiving a gentle hug from your faithful companion.

use_action.activation_message: You wrap yourself in Nova's blanket and feel her loving warmth surround you.

description: A rubber sticky toy covered in Nova's teeth marks and slobber stains. Despite its worn appearance, it's still wonderfully sticky and fun to fidget with. Playing with it brings back memories of Nova's playful energy.

use_action.activation_message: You squeeze and fidget with Nova's sticky toy. The tactile sensation calms your nerves and brightens your mood.

description: A well-loved stainless steel bowl with Nova's name etched on the side. It's been licked clean thousands of times by a devoted Labrador who always waited patiently for Daddy to fill it. Using this bowl for your own meals brings comfort and reminds you of Nova's gentle patience and unwavering trust in her Daddy.

use_action.activation_message: You eat from Nova's bowl and feel her patient, loving presence. She always trusted Daddy completely to take care of her.

description: This isn't a physical item, but a precious memory of Nova's favorite treat - the gentle pets and scratches from her beloved Daddy. When you close your eyes and remember how she would run to you with pure joy, tail wagging, seeking nothing but your loving touch, it fills your heart with warmth stronger than any medicine. Nova's love for Daddy was absolute and pure.

use_action.activation_message: You remember Nova running to Daddy with pure love, seeking only gentle pets. Your heart swells with the memory of her unconditional devotion and trust.

description: A bright orange flotation harness that once helped a golden Labrador mix enjoy safe swims with Daddy. Nova loved the water almost as much as she loved her Daddy. The harness is adjustable and surprisingly buoyant - perfect for water adventures. You can almost hear her happy splashing and see her golden coat glistening as she paddled back to shore, always returning to Daddy's side.

use_action.activation_message: You adjust Nova's harness and feel her playful splashing beside you. The memory keeps you calm in the water.

description: A small garden trowel and brush, both marked with Nova's muddy pawprints. Nova loved to dig - sometimes to Daddy's dismay, but always with such enthusiasm and protective instinct. These tools remind you of her playful spirit and fierce loyalty. She may have made a few holes in the yard while guarding her territory, but she dug her way permanently into Daddy's heart.

use_action.activation_message: You remember Nova's enthusiastic digging and protective spirit. Every hole was dug with love, energy, and devotion to Daddy.

description: A section of soft bedding that still holds the shape where Nova would curl up right next to Daddy every single night. Golden and cream fur still clings to the fabric - evidence of a loyal Lab mix who knew her rightful place was always by Daddy's side. The warmth and comfort this brings is beyond measure, like having Nova's protective, loving presence watching over you as you sleep.

use_action.activation_message: You settle into Nova's favorite spot and feel her comforting weight curl against you. The pain eases while the memory lasts.
